metadata.title: CVE-2017-14339 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The DNS packet parser in YADIFA before 2.2.6 does not check for the presence of infinite pointer loops, and thus it is possible to force it to enter an infinite loop. This can cause high CPU usage and makes the server unresponsive.

criterions.comment: yadifa package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.7-1build1').
